text.tspan: When to get tested for COVID-19 ?
You are not required to get tested for COVID-19 if you
do not have any symptoms (Cough, fever, or difficulty
If you have any of the above symptoms and have
travelled to any of the COVID-19 affected countries
(Italy, Iran, France, Spain, Germany, etc.) or you are a
contact of a laboratory confirmed positive case
immediately call the State Helpline Number or the
Ministry of Health & Family Welfare (MOHFW), or
The helpline service will note down your contact
details and contact you with the testing protocols of
If you qualify as a care for testing as per the protocol,
you will be tested at a Government approved lab only.
